subject: Re: [junit] Documentation of junit xml result format
msgSnippet: Jon, Are you talking about the results xml produced by the junit ant task?  Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Jon,

Are you talking about the results xml produced by the junit ant task? Thanks,

David Saff

On 8/20/07, marstonstudio <jon@...> wrote:
> Hello, I've been scouring the web looking for something official which
> documents the xml format used for junit results. I'm trying to
> integrate AsUnit (Flash Actionscript) with cruisecontrol.rb. I am
> generating an xml file similar to the one documented here:
> http://meb.home.cern.ch/meb/xPyUnit.htm but I am looking for a
> reference DTD or official specification for junit xml results. Does
> this exist?
>
> Jon Marston
> marstonstudio.com
